sentences.en: And Julie married Alec, dressed appropriately in virginal white.
sentences.cn: 朱莉穿着一件与此场合相称的纯白婚纱嫁给了亚历克。

sentences.en: Even amid his drabbing, he himself retained some virginal airs ( Stanislaus Joyce )
sentences.cn: 即使在嫖妓的时候, 他也让自己保持着一些童贞的风度(斯坦尼斯劳斯乔伊斯 )

sentences.en: Her face he had idealized: it looked sweet and virginal, pure as a cough drop.
sentences.cn: 她的面部却被斯威夫特理想化了,显得甜美而又纯洁, 纯得像咳嗽药水.

sentences.en: Perhaps blue eyelashes are this allusive sign , virginal behavior this fragile allusion.
sentences.cn: 可能,蓝色眼睫就是挑逗,静若处女就是似有若无的撩拨.

sentences.en: She was dressed in virginal white.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一身洁白无瑕的衣服。
她毫发未伤, 没被玷污.

sentences.en: She was no longer virginal, and there was the risk of a child.
sentences.cn: 她不再是处女了, 还有怀孕的危险.

sentences.en: Somehow she'd always been a child in his mind, pure and virginal.
sentences.cn: 不知何故，她在他心里一直是个天真无邪的孩子。

sentences.en: Virginal beauty , illusion al reality - that is Jiuzhaigou, one of nature's masterpieces!
sentences.cn: 九寨沟, 原始而华美, 奇幻而现实!大自然的杰作 啊 !

sentences.en: Virginal: Instead of lipstick , try using a lip gloss and liner. Sheer ecstasy !
sentences.cn: 水嫩: 试着用水晶效果的 唇膏 和唇线,而不是用普通的唇膏.

words.tran_cn: 处女的；纯洁的；未经利用的，处于原始状态的

trans.tran_cn: 处女的，童贞的，未经使用的，未玷污的
十六、七世纪的小型有键乐器
